title: Operations & Mgt Methods
description: Principles and applications of production and operations management to the manufacturing enterprise, including process flow analysis, production planning and scheduling, optimization, quality management and facilities planning. Restricted to MSE majors.  Credit not allowed for MSE 3220.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Majors:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (MSE 2001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and MSE 3210 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) or MSE 4775 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
